mapper.sql: a.id, a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.description, a.name, a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.type, a.sort_order AS "sortOrder", a.component, a.path, a.title, a.icon, a.level, a.button_type AS "buttonType", a.status,a.url
mapper.select: select from sys_menu a where a.id=#{id}
select from sys_menu a where a.type=#{type} and a.status=#{status} order by a.sort_order desc
select from sys_menu a where a.level=#{level} order by a.sort_order desc
select from sys_menu a where a.parent_id=#{parentId} order by a.sort_order desc
select from sys_menu a where a.title=#{title}
select from sys_menu a where a.title like concat('%',#{title},'%') order by a.sort_order desc

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.name, p.title, p.path, p.icon, p.type, p.component, p.level, p.button_type AS "buttonType", p.parent_id AS "parentId", p.sort_order AS "sortOrder", p.description, p.status, p.url FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = rp.menu_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC
